if.if: and chulizhuangtai = '1' and remark=0 and shensushenhebiaoshi= 0
and chulizhuangtai = '1' and remark=0 and shensushenhebiaoshi= 1
and chulizhuangtai = '1' and remark=0 and shensushenhebiaoshi= 2

sql.if: and status=#{status} or status is null

if.test: orderColumn != null and orderColumn != '' and order != 0

mapper.select:
select max(a.company) company, COUNT(DISTINCT a.plateNumber,a.color) as vehCount, COUNT(a.alarmreportid) as alarmCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN b.chulizhuangtai is not null THEN 1 END) as handledCount from baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime as a
INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT xiaji.id, xiaji.parent_id, xiaji.dept_name, xiaji.is_deleted FROM blade_dept shangji, blade_dept xiaji WHERE xiaji.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(shangji.tree_code,'%') AND xiaji.is_deleted = 0 AND xiaji.extend_type='机构' and shangji.id=#{deptId} ) dept on a.company=dept.dept_name
left join baobiao_alarmhandleresult as b on a.alarmreportid = b.baojingid and ifnull(b.is_deleted,0) = 0 and b.chulizhuangtai > 0 where 1=1
and a.cutoffTime >= CONCAT( '${beginTime}', ' 00:00:00') and a.cutoffTime <= CONCAT( '${endTime}', ' 23:59:59')
and a.passed = 100
and AnalyzeMode = 1
and a.AlarmType in ('无数据报警','不定位报警')
and a.AlarmType = #{alarmType}
and a.company like CONCAT(#{jigouName},'%')
and a.company = #{deptName}
and a.status = 1
-- group by a.company

select COUNT(case when alarmType='超速报警' then 1 else null end) as chaosu, COUNT(case when alarmType='疲劳驾驶报警' then 1 else null end) as pilao, COUNT(case when alarmType='夜间行驶报警' then 1 else null end) as yejian, COUNT(case when alarmType='停驶违规报警' then 1 else null end) as tingshi, COUNT(case when alarmType='无数据报警' or alarmType='不定位报警' then 1 else null end) as yichang from baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime a INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT xiaji.id, xiaji.parent_id, xiaji.dept_name, xiaji.is_deleted FROM blade_dept shangji, blade_dept xiaji WHERE xiaji.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(shangji.tree_code,'%') AND xiaji.is_deleted = 0 AND xiaji.extend_type='机构' and shangji.id=#{deptId} ) dept on a.company=dept.dept_name where 1 = 1
and a.cutoffTime >= CONCAT( '${beginTime}', ' 00:00:00')
and a.cutoffTime <= CONCAT( '${endTime}', ' 23:59:59')
and a.AnalyzeMode = 1 and a.passed = 100

select t.* from ( SELECT b.chulixingshi, b.chulimiaoshu, b.chuliren, b.chulishijian, b.fujian, b.shensushenhebiaoshi, b.shensushenheren, b.shensushenheshijian, b.shensushenheyijian FROM baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime AS a left JOIN baobiao_alarmhandleresult AS b ON a.AlarmReportID = b.baojingid and ifnull(b.is_deleted,0) = 0 where a.AlarmReportID = #{id} ) as t where 1=1 limit 1

select DISTINCT AlarmType from baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime a
INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT xiaji.id, xiaji.parent_id, xiaji.dept_name, xiaji.is_deleted FROM blade_dept shangji, blade_dept xiaji WHERE xiaji.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(shangji.tree_code,'%') AND xiaji.is_deleted = 0 AND xiaji.extend_type='机构' and shangji.id=#{deptId} ) dept on a.company=dept.dept_name
where 1 = 1
and a.cutoffTime >= CONCAT( '${beginTime}', ' 00:00:00')
and a.cutoffTime <= CONCAT( '${endTime}', ' 23:59:59')
and passed = 100 and AnalyzeMode = 1
and a.company like CONCAT(#{jigouName},'%')
and a.company = #{deptName}

SELECT DISTINCT xiaji.dept_name FROM blade_dept shangji, blade_dept xiaji WHERE xiaji.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(shangji.tree_code,'%') AND xiaji.is_deleted = 0 AND xiaji.extend_type='机构' and shangji.id=#{deptId}

SELECT AlarmReportID, VehId, BeginTime, EndTime, MaxSpeed, AlarmType, Longitude, Latitude, Velocity, Angle, Local, Elevation, Limited, Passed, Time, KeepTime, Road_Name, Road_Level, Road_Limited, DisposeAlarmName, DisposeAlarmTime, alarmcl, alarmclmsg, alarmhdremark, PushState, verifyName, verifyTime, AnalyzeMode, SysPassed, status, SynTime, plateNumber, color, company, OperatType, EndSpeed, Distance, Road_Limited2, IsSupplements, CutoffTime, verifyTime2, AlarmID, endLongitude, endLatitude, endRoadName, isRegionV, AnalyzeID, atNocturnal, BaoJingType, ChaoSuBi FROM baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime WHERE CutoffTime BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE( concat(#{beginTime}), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AND STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{endTime}), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) and passed = 100 and AnalyzeMode = 1 AND company = #{company} AND plateNumber=#{plateNumber} ANd color=#{color} ORDER BY BeginTime
SELECT shiyongxingzhi FROM anbiao_vehicle WHERE dept_id = #{deptId} AND is_deleted = 0 AND cheliangpaizhao NOT LIKE '%挂' GROUP BY shiyongxingzhi
